Posts.Content: carolupa wrote: Hi all, I have to have my first Zometa treatment next week and want to know what to expect. I am supposed to leave on an important trip a few days after that. What are the chances I won't be able to travel due to side effects. Doc says don't worry, just keep two days gap. What does everyone think? thanks! Dx 11/10/2005, IDC, 1cm, Grade 2, 10/18 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Advice on Zometa? carolupa DATO

Posts.Content: Aug 4, 2008 08:34AM carolupa wrote: Hi, this sounds like good advice, but my problem is that I was always slim and exercised a lot before I got bc, and was skinny thru the treatment too, but now that I am on Arimidex I am suddenly gaining weight, esp fat around the stomach. Am dieting, exercising etc but it doesn't seem to help. I kind of assumed it was the medicine, but maybe just advancing age and drug induced menopause? Any tips on losing this fat apart from running six hours a day ?  Also I'm not as good at resisting junk food as I used to be. That seems weird since I know how bad it is, but before bc I had more self discipline. Sometimes I feel like I owe myself that chocolate since who knows, I could be dead soon anyway? lol
Posts.Title: 80 % chance of it coming back!!! Naomi browneyes2323
